entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HebrewCalendar not working properly on client side blazor #57826
  • .Net Blazor Scaffolding not working for 'List' #57815
  • Perf regression: single_query, single_query #57814
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware, updates #57813
  • Add securitySchemes and security requirements for endpoints created by MapIdentityApis #57806
  • Add metadata to the endpoints created by the MapIdentityAPI extension method. #57803
  • ProducesResponseTypeMetadata(200) added automatically to endpoint metadata in minimal apis #57801
  • OpenApi incorrect inline schema for multi-level objects #57799
  • .NET9: Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi.OpenApiSchemaService should not be internal #57798
    Discussions
  • [Android]MessagePack Exception:The transport does not support the 'Binary' transfer #57802
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #57796

Closed

  • ➡️ Comprar Diploma Superior ✅ #57822
  • 👉 Comprar Diploma - Compra Superior Reconhecido MEC #57820
  • 👉 Comprar Diploma Superior e Ensino Médio #57821
  • NodeJS projects are still built when passing /p:BuildNodeJS=false when nodejs is installed #43310
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Consider additional FxCop rules to enable #24055
    .NET 9 Planning
  • A way to turn off App_Offline.htm detection is requested by a large Enterprise customer #30782
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #57770
  • Perf regression: fortunes, plaintext #57778
  • Add API metadata to endpoints created by MapIdentityApis #57804
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #57788
  • Error serving Blazor Framework files when using MapStaticAssets and UseBlazorFrameworkFiles together. #57756

PullRequests

Created

  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.StackExchangeRedis` package README #57825
    area-dataprotection
  • Provide `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.AzureAppServices` package README #57824
    area-infrastructure
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.EntityFrameworkCore` package README #57823
    area-dataprotection
  • [Backport] Http.Sys: Clean up Request parsing errors #57819
    area-networking, 8.0.x
  • Provide `Microsoft.Authentication.WebAssembly.Msal` package README #57818
    area-blazor
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.Client.Core` package README #57817
    area-signalr
  • [Backport] Http.Sys: Clean up Request parsing errors #57812
    area-networking, 6.0.x
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Certificate` package README #57811
    area-security
  • Include Readme.md in packages #57809
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Make serviceProviderIsService optional in constructor of EndpointMetadataApiDescriptionProvider class #57797
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Merged

  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Owin` package README #57816
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.MicrosoftAccount` package README #57808
    area-security, 10.0-preview1
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.DevServer` package README #57805
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview1
  • Provide `Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.HealthChecks.EntityFrameworkCore` package README #57807
    area-middleware, 10.0-preview1
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.QuickGrid` package README #57793
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview1
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly` package README #57773
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview1
  • Provide `Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Polly` package README #57771
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Negotiate` package README #57772
    area-security, 10.0-preview1
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.Authentication` package README #57791
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview1
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.QuickGrid.EntityFrameworkAdapter` package README #57794
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • HybridCache: relocate to dotnet/extensions #57670
    area-infrastructure
  • Use System.Threading.Lock in Kestrel #57236
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Http.Sys: Clean up Request parsing errors #57531
    Servicing-approved, area-networking, 9.0-rc2
  • Note fire-and-forget status of HubConnection event tasks #57779
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Feature/httpendpoint #57565
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Bump webpack from 5.93.0 to 5.94.0 #57592
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, pending-ci-rerun
